Source.Name: sniffnet
Source.Description: Sniffnet is a network monitoring tool to help you easily keep track of your Internet traffic. Whether you want to gather statistics, you’re curious to see who you are exchanging data with, or you need to inspect more in depth what's going on in your network, this app will get you covered.
